sentinel.led
Class LEDMesgRecvImp

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
        |
        +--java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
              |
              +--java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
                    |
                    +--sentinel.led.LEDMesgRecvImp
public class LEDMesgRecvImp
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements SentinelMesgRecv

This class implements SentinelMesgRecv. This class works as a messge listener. The global event detector sends the detection request of the notification message to the local event detector by invoking the onMessage method.

See Also:

Method Detail

onMessage

public void onMessage(SentinelMessage mesg)
This method supports RMI call from the remote machine. It receive the incoming message and determine the message type before processing this message.
